title: Bradley Cooper Reacts to Jennifer Lawrence's Essay on the Gender Wage Gap
text:
Bradley Cooper Reacts to Jennifer Lawrence's Essay on the Gender Wage Gap 
Published By: PopSugar - Today 
Bradley Cooper shared his response to Jennifer Lawrence's essay on the gender wage gap soon after it was released on Tuesday morning....
